optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --include
optionalFlags.description: Include the HTTP response status and headers in the output.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

requiredFlags.name: --body
requiredFlags.description: File or content with the GraphQL statement. Specify - to read from standard input.

commands.name: api request rest (Beta)
commands.description: Make an authenticated HTTP request using the Salesforce REST API.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --include
optionalFlags.description: Include the HTTP response status and headers in the output.

optionalFlags.name: --file
optionalFlags.description: JSON file that contains values for the request header, body, method, and URL. Use this flag instead of specifying the request details with individual flags, such as --body or --method.

optionalFlags.name: --body
optionalFlags.description: File or content for the body of the HTTP request. Specify - to read from standard input or empty string for an empty body. If passing a file, prefix the filename with @.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.
